title: Yoshiatsu Oiji
text:
is a <a href="Japanese%20people">Japanese</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player. He plays for <a href="FC%20Tokyo">FC Tokyo</a>.
Career.
Yoshiatsu Oiji joined <a href="FC%20Tokyo">FC Tokyo</a> in 2016. On March 13, he debuted in <a href="J3%20League">J3 League</a> (v <a href="SC%20Sagamihara">SC Sagamihara</a>).
